text: There’s one field of study that can claim to have ever eradicated a #disease: #immunology. The disease was smallpox. The method was a #vaccine. Super thrilled to have gotten the first dose of the #COVID19 Pfizer NBioTech mRNA vaccine! #immunologymatters #UCSFproud #endthepandemic https://t.co/BgMlxqQfCh
